description: A json schema used to specify user input forms that can be automatically created using TheDistanceForms library for iOS.
title: DistanceForm

___questions.description: The questions that make up this forms

items.description: A question entry in a Distance Form
items.title: DistanceFormQuestion

___key.description: The key that uniquely identifies this question in the form. The user's answers for a question will be associated with this key.

___question_type.description: A string representing the type of this question.

___validation.description: The validation that is associated with this DistanceFormQuestion
___validation.title: DistanceFormValidation

___value_type.description: The type of value that the validation is expected to be performed on.

___type.description: The type of validation that will be performed on the user's value for this question.

___message.description: The error message the user will see if this validation fails.

___regex.description: The regular expression to test for validation.

___title.description: The title displyed for this question. This is applicable only for question_type ChoiceSegments, Boolean, Button.

___default.description: The default value for a Boolean type question

___choices.description: The values the user can choose from in a ChoiceDropdown or ChoiceSegments question.
